rooms.description: Open entrance area with reinforced concrete finishes and exposed structure, following Brutalist aesthetic.
Spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that let in ample natural light. Walls in raw concrete finish with minimalistic design.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room, complementing the Brutalist style and large windows for natural illumination.
Modern kitchen with exposed brickwork and concrete surfaces. Appliances integrated in a way to enhance functionality while maintaining aesthetic coherence.
Service area for laundry, storage, and other utilities. Designed with raw concrete finishes.
Spacious balcony adjacent to the living room providing outdoor access and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Reinforced steel door with minimalistic design in keeping with Brutalist aesthetics.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that maximize natural light and complement the exposed concrete theme.
Large door leading to the balcony for easy outdoor access, designed with steel framing.

rooms.description: Master bedroom featuring an attached spacious balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy and natural light. Walls finished in raw concrete to adhere to Brutalist style.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony, maintaining consistent Brutalist aesthetics including floor-to-ceiling windows and exposed structure.
Additional bedroom featuring its own balcony area for personal outdoor space.
Smaller bedroom with an integrated balcony, designed in a minimalist style complementing the Brutalist design.
Final bedroom ensuring symmetry and adherence to Vastu principles by positioning the room appropriately.

openings.description: Door leading from master bedroom to its spacious balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows.
Floor-to-ceiling window for optimal daylight and ventilation.

rooms.description: A dedicated library area featuring open shelving and floor-to-ceiling windows. The space is designed to promote intellectual engagement while aligning with Brutalist design principles.

openings.description: Large window panels for natural lighting and a connection to the outdoors.
